entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023
